What's on the Menu At
Red Garden

Smoothies

Made with ingredients so classic, these blended-to-order masterpieces practically invented smoothies. All of your favorites are in the mix: real whole fruit and wholesome ingredients.

Smoothies

Strawberry-Slam

Heart-Beet

Cha-Cha-Cherry

Merry-Cranberry

Power-Pomegranate

Fresh Juices

This is the real deal. Juices made fresh by squeezing the scrumptious goodness from wholesome ingredients. It’s juice so fresh it may just make you blush. We think you’ll agree: it’s worth it.

Fresh Juices

Super-Beet Juice

Pick-Up-Cranberry Juice

Go-Go-Guava Juice

Sweet-Strawberry Juice

Wake-Watermelon Juice

Tasty Bites

Drop the greasy bag and pick up one of our delicious bites. No matter the time of day, whether alone or paired with any of our drinks, each one is the perfect choice to provide a better-for-you alternative to gut rot and a guilty conscience.

Tasty Bites

Healthy-Oats

Breakfast-Pancakes

Baked-Pretzels

Red-Garden Sandwiches

Energy Bowls

Red Garden’s energy bowls are a delicious and nutritious blend of real whole fruit, fresh Greek yogurt and/or soy milk, topped with an assortment of dry toppings & fresh fruits.

Energy Bowls

Mixed-Berry Bowl

Smooth-And-Fresh Bowl
